content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #236

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 30

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Prefetch template
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

An EHR MAY choose to honor some or all of the desired prefetch templates, and is free to choose the most appropriate source for these data.

Comment:
Does this only apply to prefetch templates or also to context fields?

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Considered - question answered
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Whether context data is optional is specified as part of the hook definition. The line in question is referring exclusively to prefetch templates.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #236

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #236

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Considered - question answered
Disposition Comment:
Whether context data is optional is specified as part of the hook definition. The line in question is referring exclusively to prefetch templates.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
